name: AstroViking
description: AstroViking is a horde-survival shoot em' up with RPG elements! Forge your own superpowered Viking with 60+ upgrades and take on an endless swarm of aliens!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 8.1 Processor: Intel Celeron CPU N2840 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 200 MB available space Additional Notes: Internet is required in the game's initial setup, but afterwards, internet is no longer required.
